channel.title: Comments on: Keep them Medical Advancements Rollin

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
Looking NE up Flower. There in the middle, Third and Flower, is the Rollin. From there, the Bozwell, St. Regis, Marcella and Winton, and the Second Street tunnel. At Second and Flower, P painted upon’t, is the Stanley. And big red to the right is the Elmar.

To the far left, top, the Clift.
